description: This source file (rdk_debug.c) provides implementation of debugging functions for the RDK platform, including log dumping, initialization, and message printing, as well as utility functions like TouchFile.

methods.name: void TouchFile(const char * pszFile)
methods.description: Creates or clears a file specified by filename to be used as a simple check or trigger.

methods.name: void rdk_dbgDumpLog(const char * path)
methods.description: Dumps current debugging log settings to the log output, indicating logging levels per module.

methods.name: void rdk_dbgInit()
methods.description: Initializes the debugging support, ensuring it runs only once per boot cycle.

methods.name: void rdk_dbg_MsgRaw(rdk_LogLevel level,const char * module,const char * format,...)
methods.description: Logs a raw debug message at a specified level and module, with printf-style formatting.

methods.name: void rdk_dbg_MsgRaw1(rdk_LogLevel level,const char * module,const char * format,va_list args)
methods.description: Logs a raw debug message with va_list parameters, similar to rdk_dbg_MsgRaw.

ctags.name: rdk_dbg_MsgRaw1
ctags.signature: (rdk_LogLevel level,const char * module,const char * format,va_list args)
